text: Esquire Network was an American pay television network. It was a 50/50 joint venture between NBCUniversal and the Hearst Corporation. It was launched on October 1, 1998 as Style Network. It was relaunched as Esquire Network on September 23, 2013. The channel ceased operations on June 28, 2017. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:2017 disestablishments in the United States
title: Esquire Network
